solution_line_template: When she orders {num_boxes} boxes, the total number of packs in the boxes is {num_boxes}*{packs_per_box} = <<{num_boxes}*{packs_per_box}={total_packs}>>{total_packs} packs.
If a pack has {diapers_per_pack} diapers, {total_packs} packs contain {total_packs}*{diapers_per_pack} = <<{total_packs}*{diapers_per_pack}={total_diapers}>>{total_diapers} diapers.
After selling all the diapers, Meadow gets {total_diapers}*${price_per_diaper} = $<<{total_diapers}*{price_per_diaper}={total_money}>>{total_money}
